parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> Arma 3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.20

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> GUI Control - ListBox

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the selected color of the second (right aligned) picture of the item with the given index of the listbox with id idc of the topmost user dialog to the given color. Color is in format [[Color|Color (RGBA)]]. Color which consists from only zeros means disable this override.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''lbSetPictureRightColorSelected''' [idc, index, color]
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc, index, color]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] of control
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> index: [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> color: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control '''lbSetPictureRightColorSelected''' [index, color]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> [index, color]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> index: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> color: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value><code>[[lbSetPictureRightColorSelected]] [101, 0, [0, 1, 0, 0.5]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>		  
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_ctrl [[lbSetPictureRightColorSelected]] [0, [1, 1, 1, 1]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[lbAdd]], [[lbClear]], [[lbColor]], [[lbCurSel]], [[lbData]], [[lbDelete]], [[lbIsSelected]], [[lbPicture]], [[lbSelection]], [[lbSetColor]], [[lbSetCurSel]], [[lbSetData]], [[lbSetSelected]], [[lbSetTooltip]], [[lbSetValue]], [[lbSize]], [[lbSort]], [[lbSortByValue]], [[lbText]], [[lbValue]], [[lbSetPicture]], [[lbSetPictureColor]], [[lbSetPictureColorDisabled]], [[lbSetPictureColorSelected]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted: Sep 10 2014</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:ffur2007slx2_5|ffur2007slx2_5]]</dt>
<dd class="note">More information on the [[CT_LISTBOX]] command family can be found [[CT_LISTBOX#Scripting_Example|here]].
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
